generated.  If I choose a template, e.g. the Hello World one, adding an
extension works OK.

Got the same problem trying to create a headless application. When creating a

has the "Create a plug-in using one of the templates" option checked by default,
but there are no templates to choose from. Unchecking that option, it works fine.
Konrad to make it go away.
